author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows  #31879 fixing one instance of the old syntax for SpecParRegistry not migrated because hidden by a commented ```EDM_ML_DEBUG``` statement. At the same time clean a bit the categories used by MessageLogger in the same class.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, unit tests are ok without geometry changes, if the debugging statement is activated it properly compiles and run.
title: MTD geometry: DD4hep specPar update, additional fix
